result.eng: She lives in a suburb called Tallagh.
result.ga: tá sí ina cónaí i mbruachbhaile darb ainm an tamhlacht
result.orig: Tá sí ina cónaí i mbruachbhaile darb ainm An Tamhlacht
result.html: tá sí ina cónaí i mbruachbhaile darb ainm an tamhlachtShe lives in a suburb called Tallagh.
result.ponchtml: tá sí ina cónaí i mbruaċḃaile darb ainm an taṁlaċtShe lives in a suburb called Tallagh.

result.eng: I live in a suburb called Kingston.
result.ga: tá mé i mo chónaí i mbruachbhaile darb ainm kingston
result.orig: Tá mé i mo chónaí i mbruachbhaile darb ainm Kingston
result.html: tá mé i mo chónaí i mbruachbhaile darb ainm kingstonI live in a suburb called Kingston.
result.ponchtml: tá mé i mo ċónaí i mbruaċḃaile darb ainm kingstonI live in a suburb called Kingston.

result.eng: ...before they went to their dull houses in the suburbs.
result.ga: sular thug siad aghaidh ar a dtithe murtallacha sna bruachbhailte
result.orig: sular thug siad aghaidh ar a dtithe murtallacha sna bruachbhailte
result.html: sular thug siad aghaidh ar a dtithe murtallacha sna bruachbhailte...before they went to their dull houses in the suburbs.
result.ponchtml: sular ṫug siad aġaiḋ ar a dtiṫe murtallaċa sna bruaċḃailte...before they went to their dull houses in the suburbs.
